executable.title: Enhance Image Using NJet Measures Fed into Discriminant Analysis (TubeTK)
executable.description: Given an image and foreground and background masks, computes multiscale Jet (0, 1, and 2 order) features at each pixel, performs a multivariate LDA or PCA for separating the classes, and generates the LDA/PCA instances of the images.
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the TubeTK project at Kitware.

image.name: labelmap
image.label: Label Map
image.description: Label map that designates the object of interest and "other".

string.name: outputBase
string.label: Output Base Name
string.description: Base name for output LDA images.

integer-vector.name: objectIdList
integer-vector.label: Object ID
integer-vector.description: List of values that represent the objects in the label map.

parameters.label: LDA Parameters
parameters.description: Parameters that determine how the LDA is generated.

boolean.name: forceSymmetry
boolean.label: Force X-Y Symmetry
boolean.description: Post-process the eigenvectors so that x/y directions are weighted equally.

boolean.name: forceSignOff
boolean.label: Force Sign Off
boolean.description: Do not post-process so that LDA images match input.

double-vector.name: zeroScales
double-vector.label: Zero-Order Scales
double-vector.description: Scales at which 0th-order features are computed.

double-vector.name: firstScales
double-vector.label: First-Order Scales
double-vector.description: Scales at which 1st-order features are computed.

double-vector.name: secondScales
double-vector.label: Second-Order Scales
double-vector.description: Scales at which 2nd-order features are computed.

double-vector.name: ridgeScales
double-vector.label: Ridge Scales
double-vector.description: Scales at which ridge features are computed.

integer.name: useNumberOfLDA
integer.label: Number of LDA
integer.description: Maximum number of linear discriminants to compute (0 = all).

string.name: saveFeatureImages
string.label: Save Feature Images
string.description: Save intermediate feature images to a file.

string.name: saveLDAInfo
string.label: Save LDA Information
string.description: Save LDA information to a file.

string.name: loadLDAInfo
string.label: Load LDA Information
string.description: Load LDA information from a file.
